title: -- Condo Quality 2 Bed -- Close to Central Square - Laundry in Unit -
posting_body: ['Apartment Rental Experts', '2 Bedroom and 1 Bath in Cambridge / Central Square $3,995', 'Cambridge / Central Square / Inman Square', 'Available:', '9/1/2022', '||', '  Fee:', 'Full Fee', '||', '  Reference:', '#172644', 'Apartment Details', 'Available:', 'September 01, 2022', 'Reference:', '#172644', 'Fee:', 'Full Fee', 'Bedrooms:', '2', 'Bath:', '1', 'Location:', 'Cambridge/Central Square', 'Apartment Summary', 'Located in the Central Square area of Cambridge within easy walking distance of Inman Sq as well.', 'About an 8 minute walk to Central T station on the Redline (.5 miles) .', ' This is two bedroom apartment has been totally gut renovated in 2015 and features a beautiful top of the line kitchen with dishwasher, hardwood floors, and all new tile bath.', 'The apartment is on the top floor and gets ample sunlight.', 'Central AC.', 'All rooms are a good size with big closets.', '(Reference #172644)', 'Call the office @ 617-684-8000', 'Email : Hit Reply top left', 'Contact Information', 'Call:', '617.684.8000', 'Please mention reference #', '172644', '* Availability, fee and monthly rent are subject to change.', ' Please call to verify details.', 'HUD:', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
